! parse
stderr 'pubsub.NewTopic can only be called as a function to create a new instance and not referenced otherwise. For more information please see https://encore.dev/docs/develop/pubsub'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"

    "encore.dev/pubsub"
)

type MyMessage struct {}

var creator = pubsub.NewTopic[MyMessage]

var topic = creator("my-topic")
